inclusion.criterion: COPD patients with an FEV1 < 80% predicted either or not using inhaled corticosteroids.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry was performed revealing a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 63% of the predicted.

inclusion.criterion: At least one COPD exacerbation for which oral prednisolone had to be prescribed during
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He is a chef with a history of asthma for 3 years, suffering from frequent cough, wheezing, and shortness of breath and chest tightness.

exclusion.criterion: Exacerbation or respiratory tract infection during the last 4 weeks prior to randomization.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of asthma, which makes him likely ineligible for the study.
